rationale: The agent made zero changes to the codebase (empty diff), while the ground truth modifies `.buildkite/scripts/update-transport-versions.sh` to change the git diff check from `--exit-code` to `--quiet -- "server/src/main/resources/transport/**"` and updates the echo message. This represents a complete failure to implement the requested task. The agent did not modify the CI script to ignore non-transport changes when auto-committing, which was the core requirement. Since no code was changed, code_reuse, best_practices, and unsolicited_docs are scored neutrally at 0.0 (no code to evaluate). Correctness and completeness are both -1.0 due to total absence of required changes.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/.buildkite/scripts/update-transport-versions.sh b/.buildkite/scripts/update-transport-versions.sh
index c3ae067f9ce9..e18c85c72b7c 100755
--- a/.buildkite/scripts/update-transport-versions.sh
+++ b/.buildkite/scripts/update-transport-versions.sh
@@ -31,8 +31,8 @@ fi
 
 .ci/scripts/run-gradle.sh generateTransportVersion --backport-branches="${backport_branches}"
 
-if git diff --exit-code; then
-  echo "No changes found after updating transport versions. Don't need to auto commit."
+if git diff --quiet -- "server/src/main/resources/transport/**"; then
+  echo "No transport version changes found after update. Skipping auto commit."
   exit 0
 fi
